item.title: More than 2,000 people reported killed at Iran protests as Trump says 'help is on its way'
item.description: A US-based rights group says it has confirmed the killing of 1,850 protesters during a crackdown by authorities, as the US president urges Iranians to...

item.title: Republicans vow to hold Bill Clinton in contempt as he skips Epstein testimony
item.description: The former president didn't show up on Tuesday to testify before a committee investigating Epstein, saying its subpoena wasn't enforceable

item.title: Prosecutors seek death penalty for ex-South Korean president Yoon
item.description: Yoon is accused of leading an insurrection when he tried to impose martial law in 2024.

item.title: Controversial Dilbert cartoonist Scott Adams dies aged 68
item.description: His ex-wife announced his death on Tuesday during a live stream of his podcast.

item.title: Le Pen blames European Parliament in appeal that could decide political fate
item.description: "We had no sense of having committed an offence," France's far-right leader tells an appeal to overturn a ban from contesting the next election.
